item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Last updated: January 1, 2021 This document covers the Privacy Policy of the Gatekeeper project (“we” / “us”). A personal project by Lukas Reschke. If you have any questions about this privacy notice, please contact us at lukas@statuscode.ch. What personal data do we collect? We collect data from two different sources. Either data you provide to us or data we collect automatically. Provided by you Email address We may collect your email address for the following purposes:
